name: Modern Sofa
title: Sleek Gray Sofa
description: A sleek, comfortable sofa that complements any living room. Made with high-quality materials for durability and comfort.

comments: Great quality, very comfortable!
The color matches perfectly with my living room decor.

additionalInformation.careInstructions: Clean with a soft cloth, avoid abrasive cleaners.

name: Wooden Dining Table
title: Classic Wooden Dining Table
description: This beautiful wooden dining table provides ample space for family gatherings and special occasions.

comments: Sturdy and well-built.
Perfect size for my dining room.

additionalInformation.careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth, avoid direct sunlight.

name: Leather Office Chair
title: Ergonomic Leather Office Chair
description: A stylish and ergonomic office chair designed for comfort during long working hours.

comments: Extremely comfortable for long hours of sitting.
High-quality leather and very sturdy.

additionalInformation.material: Leather upholstery with a steel frame
additionalInformation.careInstructions: Use a leather cleaner, avoid direct heat.

name: Decorative Floor Lamp
title: Elegant Gold Floor Lamp
description: Add an elegant touch to any room with this decorative floor lamp, featuring a modern design and adjustable light settings.

comments: Beautiful design and adds warmth to the room.
The gold finish looks amazing with my decor.

additionalInformation.careInstructions: Dust regularly, clean with a soft cloth.
